WorkGoalCollaborator.name: WorkGoalCollaborator
WorkGoalCollaborator.description: Represents collaborators on a WorkGoal object. This doesn’t include WorkGoal followers, which is handled by Chatter Feed Follow functionality.

InvitationDate.description: The date that a user was invited to become a collaborator (nill if the user was not invited).

State.description: Indicates the state of the collaborating user. Whether the user has not responded, joined, or declined collaboration. The possible values are: PendingResponse: a user who was invited to collaborate but hasn’t joined or declined Joined: a user who is collaborating on a goal (joined/commit) Declined: a user who declined to collaborate on a goal

WorkGoalId.description: The WorkGoal object that this collaborator is a part of.
